dc:title: Bromley Eviction Halted
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Praises the persistent, peaceful, and gentle methods used to halt the eviction of peace activists in a Cincinnati house--"picketing, leafleting, resisting, speaking the truth." Keywords: nonviolence
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 556 1975-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
